Name: Lawbringer
About the game: Lawbringer is a fast-paced arena fighting roguelite. Hack, slash and shoot your way through enemy hordes to appease the Autarch. The faster you slay your enemies, the greater His favor. Pick up game changing skills and a variety of weapons. Kill fast, grow strong and cheat death. BATTLE THE SPAWNS OF ENTROPY Autarch, the self-proclaimed ruler of Conjecture, sprang a trap for Yuma, the last Lawbringer. The lone gunslinger samurai is now forced to fight to the death in a bloody arena honoring the unpredictable Son of Entropy. Faced with endless waves of Shifters and Conjecture spawns, Yuma is forced to sacrifice their Potential and Time itself to survive and persevere. ENDURE AND GROW STRONGER Fight through waves of challenging enemies always trying to encircle and defeat you. Slay your enemies quickly and gain Autarch's favor. Fail to do so and He will claim your life. Collect Potential from fallen enemies and gain Perks which transform your abilities in game-changing ways. Master melee combat, utilize firearms and Perks strategically and you might yet live through the ordeal. Uncover the lore behind your captor, the world of the Construct and its denizens.
